title: Matplotlib Text Rotation
description: In this lab, you will learn how to rotate text in Matplotlib using the rotation_mode parameter. The rotation_mode parameter determines the order of rotation and alignment of the text. There are two modes available: default and anchor.

meta.title: Mastering Text Rotation in Matplotlib
meta.description: Explore the power of text rotation in data visualization with Matplotlib's rotation_mode parameter.
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, text rotation, data visualization, programming tutorial, Python
